intro: Artabotrys, commonly known as the star anise tree, is a tropical plant native to Southeast Asia. It belongs to the Anacardiaceae family and is characterized by its fragrant, star-shaped flowers. The plant produces small, dark purple fruits that are harvested for their aromatic seeds. These seeds are widely used in traditional medicine and as a spice due to their strong flavor and medicinal properties. The botanical features of Artabotrys make it an important species in both horticulture and pharmacology.
